quickOrder.pageDescription: Speed up your regular order process with trim, semi-automated order lists.
quickOrder.placeholderNameField: Enter product number or product name...

addToCartModal.title: Add to shopping cart
addToCartModal.description: Do you really want to add all products that are on this order list to your shopping cart?

removeListModal.title: Clear order list
removeListModal.description: Do you really want to clear all products from your order list?

quickOrder.uploadCSVDescription: Upload only CSV files that have columns for product numbers (product_number) and product quantities (quantity).
quickOrder.uploadErrorMessage: File error. Make sure the file has the CSV format and the exact required columns.
quickOrder.uploadRule: Some of the products in the CSV file are already on your order list. Please select the quantities that meet your demands.
quickOrder.productNotFound: The following products could not be found:
quickOrder.reloadPageMessage: Are you sure you want to leave this page? The information youâ€™ve entered may not be saved
